15 #ifndef _LIBP_ALIGN_H_
16 #define _LIBP_ALIGN_H_
17 
18 /*
19  * a type with the most strict alignment requirements
20  */
21 union max_align
22 {
23  char c;
24  short s;
25  long l;
26  int i;
27  float f;
28  double d;
29  void * v;
30  void (*q)(void);
31 };
32 
33 typedef union max_align max_align_t;
34 
35 #endif
